author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Follow up on #35489, based on suggestions at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35489#issuecomment-932229466 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36336#issuecomment-1017505414.
   * e54b5f4: emit a `LogError` if `NaN` is found in `RecHitsSortedInPhi` 
   * cabbb39:  Change to `SiStripCluster` DF, use `auto` for return types and change `size()` from `uint8_t` to `uint32_t`

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
title: do not populate `RecHitsSortedInPhi` with NaNs
